title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus as expected.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it should take focus and the focus caret should appear in the first Combo "Host:".
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo "Host:" after clicking on it.
SR: Fix the issue where the Combo does not take focus when clicked on, and ensure that the focus caret appears in the correct Combo.
